price: I ne učinite joj nikakvo zlo da vas ne bi stigla patnja na Velikom danu!”
arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaẓīmin
